newsitem.title: USA: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS -- Issues to Watch.
newsitem.headline: U.S. HEADLINE STOCKS -- Issues to Watch.

text.p: * ITT Corp shares climbed to 58 in after-hours trading Monday after Hilton Hotels Corp announced it had offered to acquire the company for $55 a share. Hilton said its offer was worth $10.5 billion, including debt.
ITT closed at 42-5/8 on the New York Stock Exchange. Hilton closed at 25-1/4.
* Walt Disney Co Monday raised its quarterly dividend to $0.1325 a share from $0.11. Shares closed at 71-5/8.
* International Business Machines Corp shares were up 1/2 at 145-7/8 in London trading.
* Oracle Corp said it expected its performance in Europe to improve in the quarter ending in February. Shares closed at 38-1/8.

* Estee Lauder Cos Inc reported second quarter earnings per share of $0.54, up from $0.45 a year ago. The First Call estimate was $0.52. The company said it was "well positioned" to meet fiscal 1997 objectives. Shares closed at 50-3/8.
